original_title: どうぶつむらのこどもたち
overview: The mayor of the animal village, Mr. Goat, has a big news. He says that a train will run through the animal village and the roads will be widened. Everyone is happy that the village will become more lively, but one after another, traffic accidents occur, and rules are made.
title: Doubutsu Mura no Kodomo-tachi
